title: KKR Leans on Infrastructure, Real Estate to Combat Inflation and Volatility
sub_head: The firm beat estimates for distributable earnings even as it swung to a net loss in the first quarter
body:
KKR & Co. said demand for infrastructure and real-estate investments remains high as investors seek refuge from inflation, rising interest rates and disruptions in public securities markets.
In the first quarter, the value of KKR’s real-assets funds—which include infrastructure and real-estate investments—rose, which helped offset write-downs of its private-equity and credit holdings, the New York firm said Tuesday.
